See also: Fehlen

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Via Middle High German and Old French from Latin fallere, cognate English fail

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfeːlən/
  • (Germany)
    		(file)
  • (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: feh‧len

Verb[edit]

fehlen (third-person singular simple present fehlt, past tense fehlte, past participle gefehlt, auxiliary haben)

  1. to lack
  2. to be absent
  3. (dated) to fail
